languages.text:
Until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} attacks each enemy that attacks the Vanguard's allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard. Additionally, until their next turn, the Vanguard always retaliates when attacked.
Until the end of combat, the Vanguard suffers +30% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources.
languages.original_text:
До начала своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}авангард{/g} атакует каждого противника, который атакует его союзников в радиусе 3 клеток от авангарда. Также до начала своего следующего хода он всегда наносит удар в ответ, если атакуют его самого.
До конца боя авангард получает на 30% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} из любых источников.

traits.locale_text:
Until their next turn, the Vanguard attacks each enemy that attacks the Vanguard's allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard. Additionally, until their next turn, the Vanguard always attacks back when attacked.
Until the end of combat, the Vanguard suffers +30% more damage from all sources.

Until their next turn, the Vanguard attacks each enemy that attacks the Vanguard's allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard. Additionally, until their next turn, the Vanguard always retaliates when attacked.
Until the end of combat, the Vanguard suffers +30% more damage from all sources.

До начала своего следующего хода авангард атакует каждого противника, который атакует его союзников в радиусе 3 клеток от авангарда. Также до начала своего следующего хода он всегда наносит удар в ответ, если атакуют его самого.
До конца боя авангард получает на 30% больше урона из любых источников.

languages.text:
每当敌人攻击{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}3格内的盟友时，先锋都会进行反击，效果持续至下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。此外，每当先锋受到攻击时，都会进行反击，效果持续至下个回合开始。
然而，先锋受到的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}都会增加30%，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text:
Until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} attacks each enemy that attacks the Vanguard's allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard. Additionally, until their next turn, the Vanguard always retaliates when attacked.
Until the end of combat, the Vanguard suffers +30% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources.

traits.locale_text:
每当敌人攻击先锋3格内的盟友时，先锋都会进行反击，效果持续至下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。此外，每当先锋受到攻击时，都会进行反击，效果持续至下个回合开始。
然而，先锋受到的所有伤害都会增加30%，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text:
Hasta su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}vanguardia{/g} ataca a todos los enemigos que ataquen a sus aliados en un radio de 3 casillas en torno a él. Además, hasta su próximo turno, el vanguardia siempre contraataca al ser atacado.
Hasta el final del combate, el vanguardia sufre un +30 % más de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} proceda de donde proceda.
languages.original_text:
Until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} attacks each enemy that attacks the Vanguard's allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard. Additionally, until their next turn, the Vanguard always retaliates when attacked.
Until the end of combat, the Vanguard suffers +30% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources.

traits.locale_text:
Hasta su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, el vanguardia ataca a todos los enemigos que ataquen a sus aliados en un radio de 3 casillas en torno a él. Además, hasta su próximo turno, el vanguardia siempre contraataca al ser atacado.
Hasta el final del combate, el vanguardia sufre un +30 % más de daño proceda de donde proceda.

languages.text:
Bis zu ihrem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} greift die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vorhut{/g} jeden Feind an, der ihre Verbündeten innerhalb eines Radius von 3 Feldern um die Vorhut angreift. Zusätzlich schlägt die Vorhut bis zu ihrer nächsten Runde zurück, wenn sie angegriffen wird.
Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erleidet die Vorhut +30 % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} aus allen Quellen.
languages.original_text:
Until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} attacks each enemy that attacks the Vanguard's allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard. Additionally, until their next turn, the Vanguard always retaliates when attacked.
Until the end of combat, the Vanguard suffers +30% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources.

traits.locale_text:
Bis zu ihrer nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} greift die Vorhut jeden Feind an, der ihre Verbündeten innerhalb eines Radius von 3 Feldern um die Vorhut angreift. Zusätzlich schlägt die Vorhut bis zu ihrer nächsten Runde zurück, wenn sie angegriffen wird.
Bis zum Ende des Kampfes erleidet die Vorhut +30 % mehr Schaden aus allen Quellen.

languages.text:
Jusqu'à son prochain {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}patrouilleur{/g} attaque chaque ennemi qui s'en prend à ses alliés dans un rayon de 3 cases autour de lui. Par ailleurs, jusqu'à son tour suivant, le patrouilleur riposte toujours s'il est attaqué.
Jusqu'à la fin du combat, le patrouilleur subit +30 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires, toutes sources confondues.
languages.original_text:
Until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} attacks each enemy that attacks the Vanguard's allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard. Additionally, until their next turn, the Vanguard always retaliates when attacked.
Until the end of combat, the Vanguard suffers +30% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources.

traits.locale_text:
Jusqu'au {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant du Patrouilleur, celui-ci attaque chaque ennemi qui s'en prend à ses alliés dans un rayon de 3 cases autour de lui. Par ailleurs, jusqu'à son tour suivant, le Patrouilleur riposte toujours lorsqu'il est attaqué.
Jusqu'à la fin du combat, le Patrouilleur subit +30 % de dégâts supplémentaires, toutes sources confondues.

languages.text:
次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}は、敵がヴァンガードの周囲3セル以内の味方を攻撃した敵を攻撃する。さらに、次のターンまでヴァンガードは攻撃された際に必ず反撃する。
戦闘終了まで、ヴァンガードはあらゆる発生源からの被{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+30%増加する。
languages.original_text:
Until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} attacks each enemy that attacks the Vanguard's allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard. Additionally, until their next turn, the Vanguard always retaliates when attacked.
Until the end of combat, the Vanguard suffers +30% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources.

traits.locale_text:
次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで、ヴァンガードは、敵がヴァンガードの周囲3セル以内の味方を攻撃した敵を攻撃する。さらに、次のターンまでヴァンガードは攻撃された際に必ず反撃する。
戦闘終了まで、ヴァンガードはあらゆる発生源からの被ダメージが+30%増加する。

languages.text:
Bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turuna{/g} dek {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Öncü'nün{/g} etrafındaki 3 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki bir dost birimine bir düşman saldırırsa Öncü de o düşmana saldırır. Ayrıca Öncü, bir sonraki turuna dek her saldırıya uğradığında misilleme yapar.
Öncü, çatışma sonuna dek her türlü kaynaktan +%30 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} alır.
languages.original_text:
Until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}Vanguard{/g} attacks each enemy that attacks the Vanguard's allies in a 3-cell radius around the Vanguard. Additionally, until their next turn, the Vanguard always retaliates when attacked.
Until the end of combat, the Vanguard suffers +30% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all sources.
